title: About
intro: My name is Christophe Tesconi. After several years working as a head chef, including experiences in London and Japan, I decided to transition into web development.
goal: My goal is simple: help my clients gain visibility and efficiency by building modern websites and applications that work for them.
values: Passionate about travel (especially in Asia), Buddhist, and committed to peace, I enjoy building projects that inspire trust, transparency, and usefulness.
cta: Looking for a reliable and approachable developer to bring your ideas to life? Contact me — I’ll be happy to discuss your project.
siteIntro: This portfolio is a fullstack project designed to showcase my technical skills and my ability to build modern, maintainable websites from start to finish.
siteStack: The back-end is powered by Symfony 7 (handling routes, API, and Twig templates), while the front-end uses React for the Navbar, interactive sections, and multilingual support.
siteFeatures: I integrated Vite.js for ultra-fast bundling, Bootstrap 5 (Lux) for responsive styling, and Symfony Mailer for a working contact form.
siteGoal: The site is fully bilingual (French/English), optimized for SEO (meta tags, future sitemap.xml), and will be deployed with secure HTTPS.
siteCTA: Curious about the code? Check it out on GitHub.
